title: Unranked scumbags
body: We need to get these unranked trashbags in bronze and not starting out in gold games where they feed 0-10.

replies.body:
if they do well enough in their placements that they get gold, they earned the right to be there. While they are in their placements, its another matter since they are trying to be placed. We were all unranked boosted monkeys at one point. Try to help them learn instead of flaming on the forums about it. Negativity helps them none and ruins your name. So unless you want to be the next Tyler1, do try to tone it down a bit and offer advice to the monkeys instead of flinging poop at them, because remember: monkeys are better at flinging poop then you are; unless you are a boosted monkey as well (with your Boosted badge, i mean Dynamic Que preference)

Have a wonderful day good friend!

Actually, everyone starts out with 1400(?) MMR when they start their ranked series for the first time. 1400 MMR is roughly silver IVish. 

So fun fact, if you're getting paired with 1400 MMR players... You have silver IV MMR. 

Just an FYI.
I'll make sure to add you to my list of people if I see in game to feed.
